txt.en: A new pit-fighting tournament has begun and you have been asked to participate.
You have successfully infiltrated the pit-fighting tournament and learned more of the horrors of Naerband.
A notice is pinned to the board:\n\n'A brave warrior is needed to infiltrate the pit-fighting tournament located at Thorzhaf, in Talath Úrui.'
Párgrub can be found near Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should talk to Párgrub and compete in the pit-fighting tournament.
